name: Psy room
description:
A man, a little girl. They meet in a bleak room, and embark on a journey. Together, they will try and heal their hidden wounds...

This is a Ludum Dare 37 game, you can vote here!


Tools
  • Godot
  • Blender
  • Krita
Team
  • Damien Picard
  • Léa Cluzel
  • Mathieu Rubio
  • Vincent Landrieux

Thanks to Flavio Perez, Kevin Nguyen
